descriptionHtml:
Just a simple bang and my first mod :) It is a replacer arrow making all glass arrows explosive. So far it only explodes the person it hits. I could not remember how I made it the first time because it would just blow things apart lol.

Oh and I should warn you.. These arrows can be used against you as well.

Hey hold up there's more waiting for you to try..

Enjoy
Chuck
